dict.acceptation: 工程师，技师；（轮船的）机师；〈美〉（火车的）司机，；（陆军的）工兵；
设计，策划；安排或处理；改变…的基因（或遗传）结构；

sent.orig: The project team normally consists of project engineer, design engineer, schedule engineer, and various specialists.
sent.trans: 项目工作组通常包括有项目工程师、设计工程师、计划工程师、以及各类专家。

sent.orig: Experience as Product safety testing engineer, R&D Engineer, Product Testing Engineer will be preferred.
sent.trans: 做过产品安全测试工程师，研发工程师，产品测试工程师等优先考虑。

sent.orig: LaoLin, Class1 Registered Structural Engineer People's Republic Engineer.
sent.trans: 老林，中华人民共和国一级注册结构工程师，高级程序员。

sent.orig: Report any urgent matters or irregularities to the Chief Engineer or Assistant Chief Engineer immediately.
sent.trans: 及时迅速的向总工程师和副总工程师报告紧急或异常情况。

sent.orig: Directions in Application Engineer and Sales Engineer to develop their functional competencies and leadership skills.
sent.trans: 应用工程师，销售工程师。制定专业能力及领导能力的提升计划。
